item.title: Alert
item.description: Alert ! Info! This is an informative message X ! Info! This is an informative message X ! Info! This is an informative message X <div class="alert"> <div class="alert__icon"> ! </div> <div class="alert__message"> <strong>Info!</strong> This is an informative message </div> <div class="alert__close"> X </div> </div> <div class="alert alert--success"> <div class="alert__icon"> ! </div> <div class="alert__message"> <strong>Info!</strong> This is an informative message </div> <div class="alert__close"> X </div> </div> <div class="alert alert--danger"> <div class="alert__icon"> !

item.title: Button
item.description: Buttons, yo Base Solid Button Success Danger disabled <button class="Button">Solid Button</button> <button class="Button Button--success">Success</button> <button class="Button Button--danger">Danger</button> <button class="Button" disabled="disabled">disabled</button> Outline Ouline Button Success Danger disabled <button class="Button Button--outline">Ouline Button</button> <button class="Button Button--outline Button--success">Success</button> <button class="Button Button--outline Button--danger">Danger</button> <button class="Button Button--outline" disabled="disabled">disabled</button> Flat Flat Button Success Danger disabled <button class="Button Button--flat">Flat Button</button> <button class="Button Button--flat Button--success">Success</button> <button class="Button Button--flat Button--danger">Danger</button> <button class="Button Button--flat" disabled="disabled">disabled</button> Inverse Inverse Outline Flat disabled <div style="background: #333C48; padding: 20px;"> <button class="Button Button--inverse">Inverse</button> <button class="Button Button--outline Button--inverse">Outline</button> <button class="Button Button--flat Button--inverse">Flat</button> <button class="Button Button--inverse" disabled="disabled">disabled</button> </div> Sizes Large Default Small <button class="Button Button--large">Large</button> <button class="Button">Default</button> <button class="Button Button--small">Small</button> Block Default <button class="Button Button--block">Default</button>

item.title: Form
item.description: Form, yo Label We'll never share your email with anyone else. Password Check me out Submit <form class="form"> <div class="form-group"> <label for="input1">Label</label> <input type="input1" class="form-control" id="input1" aria-describedby="emailHelp" placeholder="Enter email"> <small id="emailHelp" class="form-text text-muted">We'll never share your email with anyone else.</small> </div> <div class="form-group"> <label for="exampleInputPassword1">Password</label> <input type="password" class="form-control" id="exampleInputPassword1" placeholder="Password"> </div> <div class="form-check"> <label class="form-check-label"> <input type="checkbox" class="form-check-input"> Check me out </label> </div> <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary">Submit</button> </form>

item.title: Spacing
item.description: Spacing! Margins and Paddings. <!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en"> <head> <script> // Just a lilâ€™ script to show off that inline JS gets highlighted window.console && console.log('foo'); </script> <meta charset="utf-8" /> <link rel="shortcut icon" href="favicon.png" /> <title>Prism</title> <link rel="stylesheet" href="style.css" /> <link rel="stylesheet" href="themes/prism.css" data-noprefix /> <script src="prefixfree.min.js"></script> <script>var _gaq = [['_setAccount', 'UA-33746269-1'], ['_trackPageview']];</script> <script src="https://www.google-analytics.com/ga.js" async></script> </head> <body> @import url(http://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Questrial); @import url(http://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Arvo); @font-face { src: url(http://lea.verou.me/logo.otf); font-family: 'LeaVerou'; } /* Shared styles */ section h1, #features li strong, header h2, footer p { font: 100% Rockwell, Arvo, serif; } /* Styles */ * { margin: 0; padding: 0; font-weight: normal; } body { font: 100%/1.

item.title: Typography
